results.title: Short course of simvastatin has no effect on markers of endothelial activation in normolipidemic patients with systemic sclerosis
results.text_hl: Twenty-five @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Scleroderma_Diffuse</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D045743 @@@diffuse SSc@@@ were enrolled and received @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ at a daily dose of 20 mg for 28 days.

citations.NLM: Kotyla PJ. Short course of simvastatin has no effect on markers of endothelial activation in normolipidemic patients with systemic sclerosis J Int Med Res. 2018 May;46(5):1893-1901. PMID: 29557229
citations.BibTeX: @article{29557229, title={Short course of simvastatin has no effect on markers of endothelial activation in normolipidemic patients with systemic sclerosis}, author={Kotyla PJ}, journal={J Int Med Res}, volume={46}, number={5}, pages={1893-1901}}

results.title: Inhibition of systemic sclerosis dermal fibroblast type I collagen production and gene expression by simvastatin.
results.text_hl: METHODS: Cultured dermal @CELLLINE_CVCL:0594 @@@fibroblasts@@@ from 3 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Scleroderma_Diffuse</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D045743 @@@diffuse systemic sclerosis@@@ of recent onset were treated with 5 microM and 10 microM of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ for 3 or 4 days.

citations.NLM: Louneva N, Huaman G, Fertala J, Jiménez SA. Inhibition of systemic sclerosis dermal fibroblast type I collagen production and gene expression by simvastatin. Arthritis Rheum. 2006 Apr;54(4):1298-308. PMID: 16575855
citations.BibTeX: @article{16575855, title={Inhibition of systemic sclerosis dermal fibroblast type I collagen production and gene expression by simvastatin.}, author={Louneva N and Huaman G and Fertala J and Jiménez SA}, journal={Arthritis Rheum}, volume={54}, number={4}, pages={1298-308}}
